summary: The test package configures pytest fixtures to execute the class‑attributes checker on sample code and includes a suite of tests that validate how the handler processes regular attributes, constants, special (dunder) attributes, dataclass fields, and typing‑based class definitions.
business_intent: Ensure the flake8 plugin reliably detects and reports class attribute style issues across diverse Python constructs, confirming correct behavior and configurability of the attribute handling logic.
